question: Where is the "End of the World" party flyer located?
What does Max say about carrying a gun to class?
What does Max say about Mr. Jefferson's book?
What does Max say about the "Front to the Future" poster?

choices.A: She wishes she could bring a mini Warren to her Science exams
choices.B: She wishes she could travel back in time
choices.C: She wishes she could meet Leonardo DaVinci
choices.D: She wishes she could be in a movie like Back to the Future
